Description: Acetyl-CoA C-acetyltransferase (acetoacetyl-CoA thiolase); cytosolic enzyme that transfers an acetyl group from one acetyl-CoA molecule to another, forming acetoacetyl-CoA; involved in the first step in mevalonate biosynthesis
comments: Enzyme is localized to cytoplasm

Description: Deoxyhypusine synthase; catalyzes formation of deoxyhypusine, the first step in hypusine biosynthesis; triggers posttranslational hypusination of translation elongation factor eIF-5A and regulates its intracellular levels; tetrameric
comments: Incorrect rxn, enzyme involved in eIF-5A modification

Description: Flavin adenine dinucleotide (FAD) synthetase; performs the second step in synthesis of FAD from riboflavin
comments: No evidence of enzyme localization to mitochondrion found

Description: 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl-CoA (HMG-CoA) synthase; catalyzes the formation of HMG-CoA from acetyl-CoA and acetoacetyl-CoA; involved in the second step in mevalonate biosynthesis
rxn: acetoacetyl-CoA[m] + acetyl-CoA[m] + H2O[m] => 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl-CoA[m] + coenzyme A[m] + H+[m]
comments: No evidence of enzyme localization to mitochondrion found
Removed since removing r_0560

Description: Nicotinate phosphoribosyltransferase; acts in the salvage pathway of NAD+ biosynthesis; required for silencing at rDNA and telomeres and has a role in silencing at mating-type loci; localized to the nucleus
rxn: H+[m] + nicotinate[m] + PRPP[m] => diphosphate[m] + nicotinic acid D-ribonucleotide[m]
comments: No evidence of enzyme localization to mitochondrion found
Removed since removing r_0775

Description: Quinolinate phosphoribosyl transferase; required for the de novo biosynthesis of NAD from tryptophan via kynurenine; expression regulated by Hst1p
rxn: 2 H+[m] + PRPP[m] + quinolinate[m] => carbon dioxide[m] + diphosphate[m] + nicotinic acid D-ribonucleotide[m]
comments: No evidence of enzyme localization to mitochondrion found
Removed since removing r_0787

Description: Purine nucleoside phosphorylase; specifically metabolizes inosine and guanosine nucleosides; involved in the nicotinamide riboside salvage pathway
comments: No evidence of enzyme localization to mitochondrion found
Removed since removing r_0950
Removed since removing r_0950

Description: Mitochondrial adenylate kinase; catalyzes the reversible synthesis of GTP and AMP from GDP and ADP; may serve as a back-up for synthesizing GTP or ADP depending on metabolic conditions; 3' sequence of ADK2 varies with strain background
comments: YER170W does not accept ATP as phosphate donor
YGR046W is localized to mitochondrial inner membrane, and should catalyze rxns r_2441-r_2445, already existing in model but with incorrect GPR. Update GPR rule to include YGR046W.
The representation of protein lipoylation has been updated, rendering this reaction redundant

rxn: 2 S-adenosyl-L-methionine [mitochondrion] + Protein N6-(octanoyl)lysine [mitochondrion] + 2 Sulfur donor [mitochondrion]  <=> 2 L-methionine [mitochondrion] + Protein N6-(lipoyl)lysine [mitochondrion] + 2 5'-Deoxyadenosine [mitochondrion]
comments: The representation of protein lipoylation has been updated, rendering this reaction redundant

RxnNameInModel: Iron sulfur cluster assembly protein 2, mitochondrial (Iron sulfur cluster scaffold protein 2)
rxn: S-sulfanyl-[L-cysteine desulfurase] [mitochondrion] + [disordered-form [Fe-S] cluster scaffold protein] [mitochondrion]  -> S-sulfanyl-[cysteine desulfurase]-[disordered-form scaffold protein] complex [mitochondrion]
comments: The representation of iron-sulfur cluster assembly has been updated, rendering this reaction redundant
Protein is localized to outer membrane ( PMID:28819139). Add gene to grRule for cytosolic reaction (r_1736)

RxnNameInModel: NADH-cytochrome b5 reductase 1 (EC 1.6.2.2) (Microsomal cytochrome b reductase) (P35)
rxn: NADH[m] + 2 Ferricytochrome b5[m] <=> H+[m] + NAD[m] + 2 Ferrocytochrome b5[m]
comments: Cytochrome b5 is localized to the ER according to SGD.

RxnNameInModel: Putative lipoate-protein ligase A (EC 6.3.1.20) (Altered inheritance rate of mitochondria protein 22)
comments: Enzyme localized to mitochondrion.
